title: [1.8pr/1.8pr2] TooManyItems 内置修改器 [适用于1.8抢先版]
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-9-15 13:41 编辑 

[1.8PR] TOOMANYITEMS IN-GAME INVEDIT *SEP 12*

1.8

TMI is already available for 1.8 prerelease. Advantages over creative mode so far include being able to use TMI in survival mode, having access to more items, save states, etc.


TMI已经可用于1.8抢鲜版。通过创造性的模式优势，包括能够使用TMI在生存模式中，获得更多的项目，保存状态等

Monday 9/12 update: fixed lighting bug, unlimited hoes & shears.
1.8pr下载
Download for 1.8 here (1.7 and previous below) and post bug reports and feature suggestions to the thread. Make sure to delete META-INF again!

9 / 14：更新为1.8。（ 1.8pr2）
1.8pr2下载
Download for 1.8 -- Click here
